price: Wͻkaa sε: “Wode nokorε na aberε yεn anaasε woka wͻn a wͻdi fεw no ho?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
